---
title: "Dashboards Overview (work in progress)"
---

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(DT)
library(readxl)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
dashboards <- read_excel(here("files","Dashboards_online.xlsx"))
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
dashboards <- dashboards %>%
  filter(NAME != "https://catalogue.openaire.eu/service/openaire.monitor/overview")
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
datatable(dashboards)
```
